# It is defined by the kaggle/python Docker image: https://github.com/kaggle/docker-python
# For example, here's several helpful packages to load

import numpy as np # linear algebra
import pandas as pd # data processing, CSV file I/O (e.g. pd.read_csv)

# Input data files are available in the read-only "../input/" directory
# For example, running this (by clicking run or pressing Shift+Enter) will list all files under the input directory

import os
for dirname, _, filenames in os.walk('/kaggle/input'):
    for filename in filenames:
        print(os.path.join(dirname, filename))

# You can write up to 20GB to the current directory (/kaggle/working/) that gets preserved as output when you create a version using "Save & Run All" 
# You can also write temporary files to /kaggle/temp/, but they won't be saved outside of the current session
source.91c3b97b:
# Importing necessary files
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns
source.dfa34493:
# Reading Omicron variant in a variable named 'train'
train=pd.read_csv("../input/omicron-covid19-variant-daily-cases/covid-variants.csv")
source.7bca16cc:
# Displaying first 5 rows of our data
train.head()
source.36df4e3c:
# Checking out null values if any
train.isnull().sum()
source.dd65b2ea:
# Counting number of values corresponding to each location
train['location'].value_counts()
source.de05f9ab:
# Creating separate datasets with respect to OMICRON,DELTA,BETA Variants.
omicron=train[train['variant']=='Omicron']
delta=train[train['variant']=='Delta']
beta=train[train['variant']=='Beta']
source.d51e1f14:
# Adding up cases on same date using sum() method
omicron_sum=omicron.groupby("date").sum()
delta_sum=delta.groupby("date").sum()
beta_sum=beta.groupby("date").sum()
source.f6dadd8a:
# Lineplot Showing Omicron Cases Over World
# Using log as it returns natural logarithm of that particular column
plt.figure(figsize=(15,6))
plt.xticks(rotation=90)
sns.lineplot(x=omicron_sum.index,y=np.log1p(omicron_sum['num_sequences']),color='red',linewidth='3')
plt.title('Omicron Cases All Over World')
source.57a52449:
# Lineplot Showing Delta Cases Over World
# Using log as it returns natural logarithm of that particular column
plt.figure(figsize=(15,6))
plt.xticks(rotation=90)
sns.lineplot(x=delta_sum.index,y=np.log1p(delta_sum['num_sequences']),color='red',linewidth='3')
plt.title('Delta Cases All Over World')
source.cd6a4690:
# Lineplot Showing Beta Cases Over World
# Using log as it returns natural logarithm of that particular column
plt.figure(figsize=(15,6))
plt.xticks(rotation=90)
sns.lineplot(x=beta_sum.index,y=np.log1p(beta_sum['num_sequences']),color='red',linewidth='3')
plt.title('Beta Cases All Over World')
source.816724b4:
# Taking out India country out of variants dataset
omicron_india=omicron[omicron['location']=='India']
delta_india=delta[delta['location']=='India']
beta_india=beta[beta['location']=='India']
source.18ad6930:
# Lineplot for cases of different variants in India as per date
# Using log as it returns natural logarithm of that particular column
plt.figure(figsize=(15,6))
plt.xticks(rotation=90)
sns.lineplot(x=omicron_india['date'],y=np.log1p(omicron_india['num_sequences']),label='Omicron',linewidth='3')
sns.lineplot(x=delta_india['date'],y=np.log1p(delta_india['num_sequences']),label='Delta',linewidth='3')
sns.lineplot(x=beta_india['date'],y=np.log1p(beta_india['num_sequences']),label='Beta',linewidth='3')
plt.title('Cases of different variants in India')
source.b79c4b14:
# Taking out Nepal country out of variants dataset
omicron_Nepal=omicron[omicron['location']=='Nepal']
delta_Nepal=delta[delta['location']=='Nepal']
beta_Nepal=beta[beta['location']=='Nepal']

beta_Pakistan=beta[beta['location']=='Pakistan']

# Taking out Bangladesh country out of variants dataset

source.c1386221:
# Lineplot for cases of different variants in Bangladesh as per date
# Using log as it returns natural logarithm of that particular column
plt.figure(figsize=(15,6))
plt.xticks(rotation=90)
sns.lineplot(x=omicron_Bangladesh['date'],y=np.log1p(omicron_Bangladesh['num_sequences']),label='Omicron',linewidth='3')

sns.lineplot(x=beta_Bangladesh['date'],y=np.log1p(beta_Bangladesh['num_sequences']),label='Beta',linewidth='3')
plt.title('Cases of different variants in Bangladesh')
source.3a2e66d5:
# Lineplot showing different increase of omicron variant around different countries
# Using log as it returns natural logarithm of that particular column
plt.figure(figsize=(15,6))
plt.xticks(rotation=90)
sns.lineplot(x=omicron_india['date'],y=np.log1p(omicron_india['num_sequences']),label='India',linewidth='3')
sns.lineplot(x=omicron_Nepal['date'],y=np.log1p(omicron_Nepal['num_sequences']),label='Nepal',linewidth='3')
sns.lineplot(x=omicron_Pakistan['date'],y=np.log1p(omicron_Pakistan['num_sequences']),label='Pakistan',linewidth='3')
sns.lineplot(x=omicron_Bangladesh['date'],y=np.log1p(omicron_Bangladesh['num_sequences']),label='Bangladesh',linewidth='3')
plt.title('Omicron variant around different countries')
source.a6412584:
# Lineplot showing different increase of delta variant around different countries
# Using log as it returns natural logarithm of that particular column
plt.figure(figsize=(15,6))
plt.xticks(rotation=90)
sns.lineplot(x=delta_india['date'],y=np.log1p(delta_india['num_sequences']),label='India',linewidth='3')
sns.lineplot(x=delta_Nepal['date'],y=np.log1p(delta_Nepal['num_sequences']),label='Nepal',linewidth='3')
sns.lineplot(x=delta_Pakistan['date'],y=np.log1p(delta_Pakistan['num_sequences']),label='Pakistan',linewidth='3')
sns.lineplot(x=delta_Bangladesh['date'],y=np.log1p(delta_Bangladesh['num_sequences']),label='Bangladesh',linewidth='3')
plt.title('Delta variant around different countries')
source.7f23154d:
# Lineplot showing different increase of beta variant around different countries
# Using log as it returns natural logarithm of that particular column
plt.figure(figsize=(15,6))
plt.xticks(rotation=90)
sns.lineplot(x=beta_india['date'],y=np.log1p(beta_india['num_sequences']),label='India',linewidth='3')
sns.lineplot(x=beta_Nepal['date'],y=np.log1p(beta_Nepal['num_sequences']),label='Nepal',linewidth='3')
sns.lineplot(x=beta_Pakistan['date'],y=np.log1p(beta_Pakistan['num_sequences']),label='Pakistan',linewidth='3')
sns.lineplot(x=beta_Bangladesh['date'],y=np.log1p(beta_Bangladesh['num_sequences']),label='Bangladesh',linewidth='3')
plt.title('Beta variant around different countries')
source.2c29516e: Plot showing that Pakistan was affected most by Delta variant and least by Omicron variant till date.
